title: DoorDash Drivers Game Algorithm to Increase Pay
itunes:title: DoorDash Drivers Game Algorithm to Increase Pay
description:
Dr. William Haseltine, Chair and President of Access Health International, explains why opening restaurants and bars can be dangerous as virus outbreaks continue to show up around the country. Bloomberg Businessweek Technology Writer Joshua Brustein talks about the #DeclineNow movement that is testing whether workers can use a company’s software against it. Stefan Selig, Managing Partner at BridgePark Advisors and Chairman of Rotor, breaks down the merger with Sarcos Robotics to start $1.3 billion SPAC.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
